data.message: Thank you Facebook for providing free communication services to people around the world!!! Sorry so many people find it necessary to complain about everything they possible can including stuff they don't even pay for!!! ;0) I'm just thankful to be able to keep in touch with people who without Facebook  I may not have the means to communicate with or even be able to find ;0)

replies.message: Thank you for your kind words, Priscilla. We truly appreciate it. Thanks for being a part of our community. Stay awesome! -Chantal

Facebook is paid for by advertisements, on which I often click and make purchases so... technically I do contribute. I came here curious about the most recent privacy update that went unannounced. Sorry if my concern over my personal information and such bothers you so much. It doesn't mean I'm not grateful. It means I'm an alert and conscientious consumer. It's actually part of my civic duty to have concern for these things.
